Name: Statue of Tuthmosis the Fourth
Description: Tuthmosis the Fourth is depicted here with his left leg forward, holding an offering table and wearing sandals and a starched kilt in the Amarna artistic style. The pedestal is engraved with hieroglyphic signs that wish the king a happy eternity and that he be resurrected like the god Osiris. The text also contains the names and titles of the king in four vertical columns and two horizontal lines.
